mapper.select: SELECT m.id, rm.menu_name as name, m.url, m.parent_id, m.icon, m.flag, rm.sort_num, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rm.operation_authority) operation_authority FROM t_sys_menu m INNER JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.flag = #{flag} GROUP BY m.id, rm.menu_name, m.url, m.parent_id, m.icon, m.flag, rm.sort_num ORDER BY rm.sort_num
